name: Super Sonic JET - 3D
description:
For some people, the sky is the limit. For others, it’s just the beginning.
Recommended to use Accelerometer controls for better challenging experience.
Super Sonic Fighter Jetis a free action and survival game will throw you into a world of endless road, full of dangerous obstacles, towers , tunnels and challenges.
Your mission is simple: just survive!

Entertain your self with dangerous world filled with a lot of random obstacle that you must a void with your super fast and savage looking space fighter jet
it about how far you can make it , and how many diamond you can collect .
the game has a new speeding system that’s make it harder and challenging to not crash .
it’s an addicted game and it’s a lot of fun
you can post and share with us your best distance and diamond you collected

Features :

-Top quality 3D graphics! .
- Easy to learn hard to master!
- Smooth and simple space ship control system!
- Control your Fighter Jet (Space ship) with swiping left or right or Just tap the sides of the screen and hold , Also you can Use Accelerometer to make it more fun and Challenging.
- Amazing 3D environments and objects.
- Free game.
- Exciting VFX effect!
- No internet or Wi-Fi required required
- Fly through INFINITE worlds
